messages.subject: Re: Burai Scanlations?? (finally got the teaser and a few others)

messages.messageBody:
I finally got the teaser. I added it to the hosted files (see post:
manga/jdrama for download). Can't wait to get to work to download it.
I wonder what this teaser is about?

Oh Shinsengumi Imon Peacemaker and Bakumatsu manga is there too.

Bye guys/gals.. ^_^ Yeah... I'm SUPPOSED to be sleeping.. Three more
hours and the luxury of sleep will be no more... -_-

messages.subject: Burai Scanlations??
messages.msgSnippet: This might be old news... I just found out about it... On April 4 a manga scanlation group named Atlantis dream came out with a teaser for Burai. I m waiting
messages.messageBody:
This might be old news... I just found out about it... On April 4 a
manga scanlation group named Atlantis dream came out with a teaser
for Burai. I'm waiting to get this from a messageboard member
elsewhere, when I do I'll probably upload it. As Tiffany said before
there is a place where you can get translations but I chose not to
because I really don't like using paypal... Anyway I'm mightily
intrigued whether the group will still continue with the project as I
can only find the Burai project in google's cache and not in
the "updated" webpage...

Here's the cache

http://216.239.39.104/search?
q=cache:j8YgJG3EHVAJ:web.inter.nl.net/users/revena/projects.htm+atlant
isdream+burai&hl=en&ie=UTF-8

Here's the old update for burai

http://web.inter.nl.net/users/revena/old.htm

Here's their website

http://www.atlantisdream.cjb.net/

Ah! Yey! I've been waiting SO LONG for this...
